Mitochondrial Dysfunction

  • The table below contains sentences from PubMed articles, which describe the contribution of mitochondiral dysfunction in the development, or disordered physiology of, a disease.
  • The sentences are derived from predictions after applying a supervised machine learning approach.
  • The columns represent the matched concept from the UMLS Metathesaurus, the matched aging hallmark, the sentence and the PubMed identifier.
  • There are hyperlinks to the associated PubMed article.
  • To view sentences for different aging hallmarks, navigate from the drop-down list on the left.
  • To view sentences for different aging hallmarks, navigate from the drop-down list on the left.
